The claim is based on a Jan: 25 Instagram post that states the National Guard will remain in Washington, D.C., during Trump's impeachment trial out of an abundance of caution.
The post references a Jan: 25 blog entry on Polialert.com, a "Civics 101" and political news source, as the source of its contents.
A member of the National Guard is quoted: stating that they want to avoid another incident like the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
The post also mentions an apparent Polit: 000 National Guard troops in the nation's capital from the start of the trial through mid-March.
